text: [Music]
hi I'm a meal cart with AWS whether
you're running a sophisticated
enterprise content management system
advanced customer relationship tracking
tools or a simple enterprise portal AWS
is a powerful option to run your
existing Microsoft applications like
SharePoint and Dynamics with AWS
you can bring your business critical
enterprise applications to the cloud
increasing your security posture
improving performance and scaling up at
a fraction of the cost of deploying
on-premises also by adopting AWS you can
expand globally in minutes and extend
your user base easily leveraging the
same capabilities security and
reliability wherever you deploy around
the world you can rapidly adjust to
business changes and increase capacity
without having to purchase new hardware
you can grow or shrink without making
large upfront investments by using only
variable spend AWS also provides
numerous purchasing options that
simplify your procurement processes
helping you accelerate your services
adoption and letting you focus on
delivering solutions to your customers
AWS gives you a flexibility to decide
how you want to purchase your Microsoft
licenses you can buy directly from AWS
the AWS marketplace or you can bring
your own from your existing Microsoft
Agreement you can also leverage tools
like cloud formation templates and
Amazon machine images that have
predefined images you can easily deploy
this means you spend less time
configuring infrastructure and more time
delivering innovation to your customers
and stakeholders
[Music]
